level.text: An unincorporated nonprofit association may acquire, hold, encumber, or transfer in its name an interest in real or personal property.
An unincorporated nonprofit association may be a beneficiary of a trust or contract, a legatee, or a devisee.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 6 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
